com.hazelcast.spi.partition

Interface IPartitionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CoreService
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InternalPartitionService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternalPartitionServiceImpl

    public interface IPartitionService
extends CoreService
    A SPI service for accessing partition related information.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVICE_NAME
      The name of the service.

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_NAME

        static final String SERVICE_NAME
        The name of the service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPartitionOwner

        Address getPartitionOwner(int partitionId)
        Gets the owner of the partition if it's set. Otherwise it will trigger partition assignment.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partitionId
        Returns:
        owner of partition or null if it's not set yet.

      • getPartitionOwnerOrWait

        Address getPartitionOwnerOrWait(int partitionId)
        Gets the owner of the partition. If none is set, it will wait till the owner is set.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partitionId
        Returns:
        owner of partition
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        NoDataMemberInClusterException - if all nodes are lite members and partitions can't be assigned

      • getPartition

        IPartition getPartition(int partitionId)
        Returns the IPartition for a given partitionId. If owner of the partition is not set yet, it will trigger partition assignment.

        The IPartition for a given partitionId will never change, so it can be cached safely.

        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partitionId
        Returns:
        the IPartition.

      • getPartition

        IPartition getPartition(int partitionId,
                      boolean triggerOwnerAssignment)
        Returns the IPartition for a given partitionId. If owner of the partition is not set yet and triggerOwnerAssignment is true, it will trigger partition assignment.

        The IPartition for a given partitionId will never change, so it can be cached safely.

        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partitionId
        triggerOwnerAssignment - flag to trigger partition assignment
        Returns:
        the IPartition.

      • getPartitionId

        int getPartitionId(Data key)
        Returns the partition id for a Data key.
        Parameters:
        key - the Data key.
        Returns:
        the partition id.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if key is null.

      • getPartitionId

        int getPartitionId(Object key)
        Returns the partition id for a given object.
        Parameters:
        key - the object key.
        Returns:
        the partition id.

      • getPartitionCount

        int getPartitionCount()
        Returns the number of partitions.
        Returns:
        the number of partitions.

      • getMemberPartitions

        List<Integer> getMemberPartitions(Address target)

      • getMemberPartitionsMap

        Map<Address,List<Integer>> getMemberPartitionsMap()
        Gets member partition IDs. Blocks until partitions are assigned.
        Returns:
        map of member address to partition Ids

      • addMigrationListener

        String addMigrationListener(MigrationListener migrationListener)

      • removeMigrationListener

        boolean removeMigrationListener(String registrationId)

      • addPartitionLostListener

        String addPartitionLostListener(PartitionLostListener partitionLostListener)

      • addLocalPartitionLostListener

        String addLocalPartitionLostListener(PartitionLostListener partitionLostListener)

      • removePartitionLostListener

        boolean removePartitionLostListener(String registrationId)

      • getMigrationQueueSize

        long getMigrationQueueSize()

      • isMemberStateSafe

        boolean isMemberStateSafe()
        Query and return if this member in a safe state or not. This method just checks for a safe state, it doesn't force this member to be in a safe state.
        Returns:
        true if this member in a safe state, otherwise false

      • getMaxAllowedBackupCount

        int getMaxAllowedBackupCount()
        Returns maximum allowed backup count according to current cluster formation and partition group configuration.

        Returned number will be in range of [0, IPartition.MAX_BACKUP_COUNT].

        Returns:
        max allowed backup count

      • getPartitionStateVersion

        int getPartitionStateVersion()

      • hasOnGoingMigration

        boolean hasOnGoingMigration()
        Checks if there are any cluster-wide migrations.
        Returns:
        true if there are migrations, false otherwise.

      • hasOnGoingMigrationLocal

        boolean hasOnGoingMigrationLocal()
        Checks if there are any local migrations.
        Returns:
        true if there are migrations, false otherwise.

      • isPartitionOwner

        boolean isPartitionOwner(int partitionId)
        Check if this node is the owner of a partition
        Parameters:
        partitionId -
        Returns:
        true if it owns the partition. false if it doesn't or the partition hasn't been assigned yet.

      • getPartitions

        IPartition[] getPartitions()
        Returns:
        copy of array with IPartition objects create new array on each invocation, not recommended to use in high-loaded parts of code
